006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractLoader;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IConstraintLoader;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IDefinition;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AbstractTargetedConstraints;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyConstraintSet;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyTargetedConstraints;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.DefaultConstraintSet;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.DefaultScopedContraints;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.FieldTargetedConstraints;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.FlagTargetedConstraints;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IFeatureModelConstrained;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IModelConstrained;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IScopedContraints;
030import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ITargetedConstraints;
031import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IValueConstrained;
032import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ValueConstraintSet;
033import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
034import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
035import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
036import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.DeserializationFeature;
037import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.IBoundLoader;
038import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.AssemblyConstraints;
039import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.MetapathContext;
040import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.MetaschemaMetaConstraints;
041import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.MetaschemaMetapath;
042import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.MetaschemaModelModule;
043import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding.MetaschemaModuleConstraints;
044import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.impl.ConstraintBindingSupport;
045
046import org.apache.xmlbeans.impl.values.XmlValueNotSupportedException;
047
048import java.io.IOException;
049import java.net.URI;
050import java.util.Collection;
051import java.util.Deque;
052import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
053import java.util.LinkedList;
054import java.util.List;
055import java.util.Set;
056import java.util.stream.Collectors;
057import java.util.stream.Stream;
058
059import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
060import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
061import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
062
063/**
064 * Provides methods to load a constraint set expressed in XML.
065 * <p>
066 * Loaded constraint instances are cached to avoid the need to load them for
067 * every use. Any constraint set imported is also loaded and cached
068 * automatically.
069 */
070public class BindingConstraintLoader
071    extends AbstractLoader<List<IConstraintSet>>
072    implements IConstraintLoader {
073
074  @NonNull
075  private final IBoundLoader loader;
076
077  public BindingConstraintLoader(@NonNull IBindingContext bindingContext) {
078    // ensure the bindings are registered
079    bindingContext.registerModule(MetaschemaModelModule.class);
080
081    this.loader = bindingContext.newBoundLoader();
082    this.loader.enableFeature(DeserializationFeature.DESERIALIZE_VALIDATE_CONSTRAINTS);
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  protected List<IConstraintSet> parseResource(@NonNull URI resource, @NonNull Deque<URI> visitedResources)
087      throws IOException {
088
089    Object constraintsDocument = loader.load(resource);
090
091    StaticContext.Builder builder = StaticContext.builder()
092        .baseUri(resource);
093
094    builder.useWildcardWhenNamespaceNotDefaulted(true);
095
096    List<IConstraintSet> retval;
097    if (constraintsDocument instanceof MetaschemaModuleConstraints) {
098      MetaschemaModuleConstraints obj = (MetaschemaModuleConstraints) constraintsDocument;
099
100      // now check if this constraint set imports other constraint sets
101      List<MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Import> imports = CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(obj.getImports());
102
103      @NonNull
104      Set<IConstraintSet> importedConstraints;
105      if (imports.isEmpty()) {
106        importedConstraints = CollectionUtil.emptySet();
107      } else {
108        try {
109          importedConstraints = new LinkedHashSet<>();
110          for (MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Import imported : imports) {
111            URI importedResource = imported.getHref();
112            importedResource = ObjectUtils.notNull(resource.resolve(importedResource));
113            importedConstraints.addAll(loadInternal(importedResource, visitedResources));
114          }
115        } catch (MetaschemaException ex) {
116          throw new IOException(ex);
117        }
118      }
119
120      CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(obj.getNamespaceBindings()).stream()
121          .forEach(binding -> builder.namespace(
122              ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getPrefix()),
123              ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getUri())));
124      ISource source = ISource.externalSource(builder.build());
125
126      // now create this constraint set
127      retval = CollectionUtil.singletonList(new DefaultConstraintSet(
128          resource,
129          parseScopedConstraints(obj, source),
130          new LinkedHashSet<>(importedConstraints)));
131    } else if (constraintsDocument instanceof MetaschemaMetaConstraints) {
132      MetaschemaMetaConstraints obj = (MetaschemaMetaConstraints) constraintsDocument;
133
134      // now check if this constraint set imports other constraint sets
135      List<MetaschemaMetaConstraints.Import> imports = CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(obj.getImports());
136
137      retval = new LinkedList<>();
138      if (!imports.isEmpty()) {
139        try {
140          for (MetaschemaMetaConstraints.Import imported : imports) {
141            URI importedResource = imported.getHref();
142            importedResource = ObjectUtils.notNull(resource.resolve(importedResource));
143            retval.addAll(loadInternal(importedResource, visitedResources));
144          }
145        } catch (MetaschemaException ex) {
146          throw new IOException(ex);
147        }
148      }
149
150      CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(obj.getNamespaceBindings()).stream()
151          .forEach(binding -> builder.namespace(
152              ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getPrefix()),
153              ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getUri())));
154
155      ISource source = ISource.externalSource(builder.build());
156
157      List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints = ObjectUtils.notNull(CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(obj.getContexts())
158          .stream()
159          .flatMap(context -> parseContext(ObjectUtils.notNull(context), null, source)
160              .getTargetedConstraints().stream())
161          .collect(Collectors.toList()));
162      retval.add(new MetaConstraintSet(targetedConstraints));
163
164      retval = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(retval);
165    } else {
166      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(String.format("Unsupported constraint content '%s'.", resource));
167    }
168    return retval;
169  }
170
171  /**
172   * Parse individual constraint definitions from the provided XMLBeans object.
173   *
174   * @param obj
175   *          the XMLBeans object
176   * @param source
177   *          the source of the constraint content
178   * @return the scoped constraint definitions
179   */
180  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops") // intentional
181  @NonNull
182  protected List<IScopedContraints> parseScopedConstraints(
183      @NonNull MetaschemaModuleConstraints obj,
184      @NonNull ISource source) {
185    List<IScopedContraints> scopedConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
186
187    for (MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope scope : CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(obj.getScopes())) {
188      assert scope != null;
189
190      List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
191      try {
192        for (IValueConstraintsBase constraintsObj : CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(scope.getConstraints())) {
193          if (constraintsObj instanceof MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Assembly) {
194            targetedConstraints.add(handleScopedAssembly(
195                (MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Assembly) constraintsObj,
196                source));
197          } else if (constraintsObj instanceof MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Field) {
198            targetedConstraints.add(handleScopedField(
199                (MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Field) constraintsObj,
200                source));
201          } else if (constraintsObj instanceof MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Flag) {
202            targetedConstraints.add(handleScopedFlag(
203                (MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Flag) constraintsObj,
204                source));
205          }
206        }
207      } catch (MetapathException | XmlValueNotSupportedException ex) {
208        if (ex.getCause() instanceof MetapathException) {
209          throw new MetapathException(
210              String.format("Unable to compile a Metapath in '%s'. %s",
211                  source.getSource(),
212                  ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
213              ex);
214        }
215        throw ex;
216      }
217
218      URI namespace = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(scope.getMetaschemaNamespace());
219      String shortName = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(scope.getMetaschemaShortName());
220
221      scopedConstraints.add(new DefaultScopedContraints(
222          namespace,
223          shortName,
224          CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(targetedConstraints)));
225    }
226    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(scopedConstraints);
227  }
228
229  private static AssemblyTargetedConstraints handleScopedAssembly(
230      @NonNull MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Assembly obj,
231      @NonNull ISource source) {
232    IModelConstrained constraints = new AssemblyConstraintSet();
233    ConstraintBindingSupport.parse(constraints, obj, source);
234    return new AssemblyTargetedConstraints(
235        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(obj.getTarget()),
236        constraints);
237  }
238
239  private static FieldTargetedConstraints handleScopedField(
240      @NonNull MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Field obj,
241      @NonNull ISource source) {
242    IValueConstrained constraints = new ValueConstraintSet();
243    ConstraintBindingSupport.parse(constraints, obj, source);
244
245    return new FieldTargetedConstraints(
246        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(obj.getTarget()),
247        constraints);
248  }
249
250  private static FlagTargetedConstraints handleScopedFlag(
251      @NonNull MetaschemaModuleConstraints.Scope.Flag obj,
252      @NonNull ISource source) {
253    IValueConstrained constraints = new ValueConstraintSet();
254    ConstraintBindingSupport.parse(constraints, obj, source);
255
256    return new FlagTargetedConstraints(
257        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(obj.getTarget()),
258        constraints);
259  }
260
261  private Context parseContext(
262      @NonNull MetapathContext contextObj,
263      @Nullable Context parent,
264      @NonNull ISource source) {
265
266    List<String> metapaths;
267    if (parent == null) {
268      metapaths = ObjectUtils.notNull(CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(contextObj.getMetapaths()).stream()
269          .map(MetaschemaMetapath::getTarget)
270          .collect(Collectors.toList()));
271    } else {
272      List<String> parentMetapaths = parent.getMetapaths().stream()
273          .collect(Collectors.toList());
274      metapaths = ObjectUtils.notNull(CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(contextObj.getMetapaths()).stream()
275          .map(MetaschemaMetapath::getTarget)
276          .flatMap(childPath -> parentMetapaths.stream()
277              .map(parentPath -> parentPath + '/' + childPath))
278          .collect(Collectors.toList()));
279    }
280
281    AssemblyConstraints contextConstraints = contextObj.getConstraints();
282    IModelConstrained constraints = new AssemblyConstraintSet();
283    if (contextConstraints != null) {
284      ConstraintBindingSupport.parse(constraints, contextConstraints, source);
285    }
286    Context context = new Context(metapaths, constraints);
287
288    List<Context> childContexts = ObjectUtils.notNull(CollectionUtil.listOrEmpty(contextObj.getContexts()).stream()
289        .map(childObj -> parseContext(ObjectUtils.notNull(childObj), context, source))
290        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
291
292    context.addAll(childContexts);
293
294    return context;
295  }
296
297  private static class Context {
298    @NonNull
299    private final List<String> metapaths;
300    @NonNull
301    private final List<Context> childContexts = new LinkedList<>();
302    @NonNull
303    private final Lazy<List<ITargetedConstraints>> targetedConstraints;
304
305    public Context(
306        @NonNull List<String> metapaths,
307        @NonNull IModelConstrained constraints) {
308      this.metapaths = metapaths;
309      this.targetedConstraints = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> {
310
311        Stream<ITargetedConstraints> paths = getMetapaths().stream()
312            .map(metapath -> new MetaTargetedContraints(ObjectUtils.notNull(metapath), constraints));
313        Stream<ITargetedConstraints> childPaths = childContexts.stream()
314            .flatMap(child -> child.getTargetedConstraints().stream());
315
316        return Stream.concat(paths, childPaths)
317            .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList());
318      }));
319    }
320
321    @NonNull
322    public List<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedConstraints() {
323      return ObjectUtils.notNull(targetedConstraints.get());
324    }
325
326    public void addAll(@NonNull Collection<Context> childContexts) {
327      childContexts.addAll(childContexts);
328    }
329
330    @NonNull
331    public List<String> getMetapaths() {
332      return metapaths;
333    }
334  }
335
336  private static class MetaTargetedContraints
337      extends AbstractTargetedConstraints<IModelConstrained>
338      implements IFeatureModelConstrained {
339
340    protected MetaTargetedContraints(
341        @NonNull String target,
342        @NonNull IModelConstrained constraints) {
343      super(target, constraints);
344    }
345
346    /**
347     * Apply the constraints to the provided {@code definition}.
348     * <p>
349     * This will be called when a definition is found that matches the target
350     * expression.
351     *
352     * @param definition
353     *          the definition to apply the constraints to.
354     */
355    protected void applyTo(@NonNull IDefinition definition) {
356      getLetExpressions().values().forEach(definition::addLetExpression);
357      getAllowedValuesConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
358      getMatchesConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
359      getIndexHasKeyConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
360      getExpectConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
361    }
362
363    protected void applyTo(@NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition) {
364      applyTo((IDefinition) definition);
365      getIndexConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
366      getUniqueConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
367      getHasCardinalityConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
368    }
369
370    @Override
371    public void target(IFlagDefinition definition) {
372      applyTo(definition);
373    }
374
375    @Override
376    public void target(IFieldDefinition definition) {
377      applyTo(definition);
378    }
379
380    @Override
381    public void target(IAssemblyDefinition definition) {
382      applyTo(definition);
383    }
384  }
385
386  private static final class MetaConstraintSet implements IConstraintSet {
387    @NonNull
388    private final List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints;
389
390    private MetaConstraintSet(@NonNull List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints) {
391      this.targetedConstraints = targetedConstraints;
392    }
393
394    @Override
395    public Iterable<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedConstraintsForModule(IModule module) {
396      return targetedConstraints;
397    }
398
399    @Override
400    public Collection<IConstraintSet> getImportedConstraintSets() {
401      return CollectionUtil.emptyList();
402    }
403
404  }
405}
